00036 #define GFLOAT_POW powf

00044 #define GFLOAT_LOG10 log10f

00063 XGraph::XGraph(const char *name, bool runtime) : 
00064     XNode(name, runtime),
00065     m_bUpdateScheduled(false),
00066     m_label(create<XStringNode>("Label", true)),
00067     m_lsnPropertyChanged(label()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(shared_from_this(),
00068                                                                &XGraph::onPropertyChanged)),
00069     m_axes(create<XAxisList>("Axes", true)),
00070     m_plots(create<XPlotList>("Plots", true)),
00071     m_backGround(create<XHexNode>("BackGround", true)),
00072     m_titleColor(create<XHexNode>("TitleColor", true)),
00073     m_drawLegends(create<XBoolNode>("DrawLegends", true)),
00074     m_persistence(create<XDoubleNode>("Persistence", true))
00075 {
00076     backGround()->onValueChanged().connect(lsnPropertyChanged());
00077     titleColor()->onValueChanged().connect(lsnPropertyChanged());
00078     drawLegends()->onValueChanged().connect(lsnPropertyChanged());
00079     persistence()->onValueChanged().connect(lsnPropertyChanged());
00080     backGround()->value(clWhite);
00081     titleColor()->value(clBlack);
00082     drawLegends()->value(true);
00083     
00084     label()->value(name);
00085     (axes()->create<XAxis>("XAxis", true, XAxis::DirAxisX
00086                            , false, dynamic_pointer_cast<XGraph>(shared_from_this())))
00087         ->label()->value(i18n("X Axis").toUtf8().data());
00088     (axes()->create<XAxis>("YAxis", true, XAxis::DirAxisY
00089                            , false, dynamic_pointer_cast<XGraph>(shared_from_this())))
00090         ->label()->value(i18n("Y Axis").toUtf8().data());
00091 }

00093 void
00094 XGraph::onPropertyChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00095 {
00096     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*this);
00097     requestUpdate();
00098 }
00099 
00100 void
00101 XGraph::requestUpdate()
00102 {
00103     ASSERT(m_graphLock.isLocked());
00104     m_bUpdateScheduled = true;
00105 }
00106 void
00107 XGraph::unlock()
00108 {
00109     m_graphLock.writeUnlock();
00110     if(!m_graphLock.isLocked() && m_bUpdateScheduled)
00111     {
00112         m_bUpdateScheduled = false;
00113         onUpdate().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XGraph>(shared_from_this()));
00114     }
00115 }
00116 void
00117 XGraph::lock()
00118 {
00119     m_graphLock.writeLock();
00120 }
00121 
00122 void
00123 XGraph::setupRedraw(float resolution)
00124 {
00125     XScopedReadLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_graphLock);
00126   
00127     m_bUpdateScheduled = false;
00128   
00129     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(axes()->children());
00130     if(axes_list) { 
00131         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++) {
00132             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00133             axis->startAutoscale(resolution, *axis->autoScale() );
00134         }
00135     }
00136     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(plots()->children());
00137     if(plots_list) { 
00138         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++) {
00139             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00140             XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*plot);
00141             if(lock) {
00142                 plot->snapshot();
00143                 plot->validateAutoScale();
00144             }
00145         }
00146     }
00147     if(axes_list) { 
00148         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00149         {
00150             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00151             if(*axis->autoScale())
00152                 axis->zoom(true, true, UNZOOM_ABIT);
00153             axis->fixScale(resolution, true);
00154         }
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 void
00159 XGraph::zoomAxes(float resolution, 
00160                  XGraph::GFloat scale, const XGraph::ScrPoint &center)
00161 {
00162     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(axes()->children());
00163     if(axes_list) { 
00164         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00165         {
00166             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00167             axis->startAutoscale(resolution);
00168         }
00169     }
00170 //   validateAutoScale();
00171     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*this);
00172     if(axes_list) {
00173         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00174         {
00175             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00176             axis->zoom(true, true, scale, axis->screenToAxis(center));
00177             axis->fixScale(resolution);
00178         }
00179     }
00180 }

00182 XPlot::XPlot(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph)
00183     : XNode(name, runtime),
00184       m_graph(graph),
00185       m_label(create<XStringNode>("Label", true)),
00186       m_maxCount(create<XUIntNode>("MaxCount", true)),
00187       m_displayMajorGrid(create<XBoolNode>("DisplayMajorGrid", true)),
00188       m_displayMinorGrid(create<XBoolNode>("DisplayMinorGrid", true)),
00189       m_drawLines(create<XBoolNode>("DrawLines", true)),
00190       m_drawBars(create<XBoolNode>("DrawBars", true)),
00191       m_drawPoints(create<XBoolNode>("DrawPoints", true)),
00192       m_colorPlot(create<XBoolNode>("ColorPlot", true)),
00193       m_majorGridColor(create<XHexNode>("MajorGridColor", true)),
00194       m_minorGridColor(create<XHexNode>("MinorGridColor", true)),
00195       m_pointColor(create<XHexNode>("PointColor", true)),
00196       m_lineColor(create<XHexNode>("LineColor", true)),
00197       m_barColor(create<XHexNode>("BarColor", true)), //, BarInnerColor;
00198       m_colorPlotColorHigh(create<XHexNode>("ColorPlotColorHigh", true)),
00199       m_colorPlotColorLow(create<XHexNode>("ColorPlotColorLow", true)),
00200       m_clearPoints(create<XNode>("ClearPoints", true)),
00201       m_axisX(create<XItemNode<XAxisList, XAxis> >("AxisX", true, graph->axes())),
00202       m_axisY(create<XItemNode<XAxisList, XAxis> >("AxisY", true, graph->axes())),
00203       m_axisZ(create<XItemNode<XAxisList, XAxis> >("AxisZ", true, graph->axes())),
00204       m_axisW(create<XItemNode<XAxisList, XAxis> >("AxisW", true, graph->axes())),
00205       //! z value without AxisZ
00206       m_zwoAxisZ(create<XDoubleNode>("ZwoAxisZ", true)),
00207       m_intensity(create<XDoubleNode>("Intensity", true)),
00208       m_cntSnapped(0)
00209 {
00210 //  MaxCount.value(0);
00211     drawLines()->value(true);
00212     drawBars()->value(false);
00213     drawPoints()->value(true);
00214     majorGridColor()->value(clAqua);
00215     minorGridColor()->value(clLime);
00216     lineColor()->value(clRed);
00217     pointColor()->value(clRed);
00218     barColor()->value(clRed);
00219     displayMajorGrid()->value(true);
00220     displayMinorGrid()->value(false);
00221     intensity()->setFormat("%.2f");
00222     intensity()->value(1.0);
00223     colorPlot()->value(false);
00224     colorPlotColorHigh()->value(clRed);
00225     colorPlotColorLow()->value(clBlue);
00226     
00227     m_lsnMaxCount = maxCount()->onValueChanged().connectWeak
00228         (shared_from_this(), &XPlot::onSetMaxCount);
00229     m_lsnClearPoints = clearPoints()->onTouch().connectWeak
00230         (shared_from_this(), &XPlot::onClearPoints);
00231 
00232     drawLines()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00233     drawBars()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00234     drawPoints()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00235     majorGridColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00236     minorGridColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00237     pointColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00238     lineColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00239     barColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00240     displayMajorGrid()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00241     displayMinorGrid()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00242     intensity()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00243     colorPlot()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00244     colorPlotColorHigh()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00245     colorPlotColorLow()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00246     
00247     zwoAxisZ()->value(0.15);
00248 }
00249 
00250 bool
00251 XPlot::trylock()
00252 {
00253     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = *axisX();
00254     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = *axisY();
00255     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = *axisZ();
00256     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisw = *axisW();
00257     if(!axisx || !axisy) {
00258         return false;
00259     }
00260     m_curAxisX = axisx;
00261     m_curAxisY = axisy;
00262     m_curAxisZ = axisz;
00263     m_curAxisW = axisw;
00264     m_scr0.x = *m_curAxisX->x();
00265     m_scr0.y = *m_curAxisY->y();
00266     m_len.x = *m_curAxisX->length();
00267     m_len.y = *m_curAxisY->length();
00268     if(!m_curAxisZ) {
00269         m_scr0.z = *zwoAxisZ();
00270         m_len.z = (XGraph::SFloat)0.0;
00271     }
00272     else {
00273         m_scr0.z = *m_curAxisZ->z();
00274         m_len.z = *m_curAxisZ->length();
00275     }
00276     return true;
00277 }
00278 
00279 void
00280 XPlot::unlock()
00281 {
00282 }
00283 void
00284 XPlot::screenToGraph(const XGraph::ScrPoint &pt, XGraph::GPoint *g)
00285 {
00286     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = *axisX();
00287     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = *axisY();
00288     shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = *axisZ();
00289     if(!axisz)
00290         g->z = (XGraph::GFloat)0.0;
00291     else
00292         g->z = (pt.z - *axisz->z()) / *axisz->length();
00293     g->x = (pt.x - *axisx->x()) / *axisx->length();
00294     g->y = (pt.y - *axisy->y()) / *axisy->length();
00295 }
00296 void
00297 XPlot::graphToVal(const XGraph::GPoint &pt, XGraph::ValPoint *val)
00298 {
00299     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00300     if(lock) {
00301         val->x = m_curAxisX->axisToVal(pt.x);
00302         val->y = m_curAxisY->axisToVal(pt.y);
00303         if(m_curAxisZ)
00304             val->z = m_curAxisZ->axisToVal(pt.z);
00305         else
00306             val->z = (XGraph::VFloat)0.0;
00307     }
00308 }
00309 int
00310 XPlot::screenToVal(const XGraph::ScrPoint &scr, XGraph::ValPoint *val, XGraph::SFloat scr_prec)
00311 {
00312     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00313     if(lock) {
00314         val->x = m_curAxisX->axisToVal(m_curAxisX->screenToAxis(scr), scr_prec / m_len.x);
00315         val->y = m_curAxisY->axisToVal(m_curAxisY->screenToAxis(scr), scr_prec / m_len.y);
00316         val->z = (m_curAxisZ) ? m_curAxisZ->axisToVal(m_curAxisZ->screenToAxis(scr), scr_prec / m_len.z) : (XGraph::GFloat)0.0;
00317         return 0;
00318     }
00319     return -1;
00320 }
00321 void
00322 XPlot::graphToScreen(const XGraph::GPoint &pt, XGraph::ScrPoint *scr)
00323 {
00324     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00325     if(lock) {
00326         graphToScreenFast(pt, scr);
00327     }
00328 }
00329 void
00330 XPlot::graphToScreenFast(const XGraph::GPoint &pt, XGraph::ScrPoint *scr)
00331 {
00332     scr->x = m_scr0.x + m_len.x * pt.x;
00333     scr->y = m_scr0.y + m_len.y * pt.y;
00334     scr->z = m_scr0.z + m_len.z * pt.z;
00335     scr->w = std::min(std::max(pt.w, (XGraph::GFloat)0.0), (XGraph::GFloat)1.0);
00336 }
00337 void
00338 XPlot::valToGraphFast(const XGraph::ValPoint &pt, XGraph::GPoint *gr)
00339 {
00340     gr->x = m_curAxisX->valToAxis(pt.x);
00341     gr->y = m_curAxisY->valToAxis(pt.y);
00342     if(m_curAxisZ)
00343         gr->z = m_curAxisZ->valToAxis(pt.z);
00344     else
00345         gr->z = 0.0;
00346     if(m_curAxisW)
00347         gr->w = m_curAxisW->valToAxis(pt.w);
00348     else
00349         gr->w = pt.w;
00350 }
00351 int
00352 XPlot::findPoint(int start, const XGraph::GPoint &gmin, const XGraph::GPoint &gmax, 
00353                  XGraph::GFloat width, XGraph::ValPoint *val, XGraph::GPoint *g1)
00354 {
00355     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00356     if(lock) {
00357         for(unsigned int i = start; i < snappedCount(); i++) {
00358             XGraph::ValPoint v;
00359             XGraph::GPoint g2;
00360             v = snappedPoints(i);
00361             valToGraphFast(v, &g2);
00362             if(g2.distance2(gmin, gmax) < width*width) {
00363                 *val = v;
00364                 *g1 = g2;
00365                 return i;
00366             }
00367         }
00368     }
00369     return -1;
00370 }
00371 
00372 void
00373 XPlot::onSetMaxCount(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00374 {
00375     int cnt = *maxCount();
00376     setMaxCount(cnt);
00377 }
00378 
00379 void
00380 XPlot::drawGrid(XQGraphPainter *painter, shared_ptr<XAxis> &axis1, shared_ptr<XAxis> &axis2)
00381 {
00382     int len = SFLOAT_LRINT(1.0/painter->resScreen());
00383     painter->beginLine(1.0);
00384     if(*displayMajorGrid() || *displayMinorGrid())
00385     {
00386         XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2;
00387         for(int i = 0; i < len; i++)
00388         {
00389             XGraph::GFloat x = (XGraph::GFloat)i/len;
00390             graphToScreenFast(XGraph::GPoint((axis1 == m_curAxisX) ? x : 0.0,
00391                                              (axis1 == m_curAxisY) ? x : 0.0, (axis1 == m_curAxisZ) ? x : 0.0), &s1);
00392             graphToScreenFast(XGraph::GPoint(
00393                                   (axis1 == m_curAxisX) ? x : ((axis2 == m_curAxisX) ? 1.0 : 0.0),
00394                                   (axis1 == m_curAxisY) ? x : ((axis2 == m_curAxisY) ? 1.0 : 0.0),
00395                                   (axis1 == m_curAxisZ) ? x : ((axis2 == m_curAxisZ) ? 1.0 : 0.0)),
00396                               &s2);
00397             XGraph::VFloat tempx;
00398             switch(axis1->queryTic(len, i, &tempx))
00399             {
00400             case XAxis::MajorTic:
00401                 if(*displayMajorGrid())
00402                 {
00403                     painter->setColor(*majorGridColor(),
00404                                       max(0.0, min(*intensity() * 0.7, 0.5)) );
00405                     painter->setVertex(s1);
00406                     painter->setVertex(s2);
00407                 }
00408                 break;
00409             case XAxis::MinorTic:
00410                 if(*displayMinorGrid())
00411                 {
00412                     painter->setColor(*minorGridColor(),
00413                                       max(0.0, min(*intensity() * 0.5, 0.5)) );
00414                     painter->setVertex(s1);
00415                     painter->setVertex(s2);
00416                 }
00417                 break;
00418             default:
00419                 break;
00420             }
00421         }
00422     }
00423     painter->endLine();
00424 }
00425 void
00426 XPlot::drawGrid(XQGraphPainter *painter, bool drawzaxis)
00427 {
00428     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00429     if(lock) {
00430         drawGrid(painter, m_curAxisX, m_curAxisY);
00431         drawGrid(painter, m_curAxisY, m_curAxisX);
00432         if(m_curAxisZ && drawzaxis) {
00433             drawGrid(painter, m_curAxisX, m_curAxisZ);
00434             drawGrid(painter, m_curAxisZ, m_curAxisX);
00435             drawGrid(painter, m_curAxisY, m_curAxisZ);
00436             drawGrid(painter, m_curAxisZ, m_curAxisY);
00437         }
00438     }
00439 }
00440 int
00441 XPlot::drawLegend(XQGraphPainter *painter, const XGraph::ScrPoint &spt, float dx, float dy)
00442 {
00443     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00444     if(lock) {      
00445         bool colorplot = *colorPlot();
00446         bool hasweight = m_curAxisW;
00447         unsigned int colorhigh = *colorPlotColorHigh();
00448         unsigned int colorlow = *colorPlotColorLow();
00449         float alpha1 = hasweight ? 0.2 : 1.0;
00450         float alpha2 = 1.0;
00451         if(*drawBars())
00452         {
00453             float alpha = max(0.0f, min((float)(*intensity() * PLOT_BAR_INTENS), 1.0f));
00454             painter->beginLine(1.0);
00455             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2;
00456             s1 = spt;
00457             s1 += XGraph::ScrPoint(0, dy/2, 0);
00458             s2 = spt;
00459             s2 -= XGraph::ScrPoint(0, dy/2, 0);
00460             painter->setColor(*barColor(), alpha1*alpha);
00461             if(colorplot) painter->setColor(colorhigh, alpha1*alpha); 
00462             painter->setVertex(s1);
00463             painter->setColor(*barColor(), alpha2*alpha);
00464             if(colorplot) painter->setColor(colorlow, alpha2*alpha);
00465             painter->setVertex(s2);
00466             painter->endLine();
00467         }
00468         if(*drawLines())
00469         {
00470             float alpha = max(0.0f, min((float)(*intensity() * PLOT_LINE_INTENS), 1.0f));
00471             painter->beginLine(1.0);
00472             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2;
00473             s1 = spt;
00474             s1 += XGraph::ScrPoint(dx/2, 0, 0);
00475             s2 = spt;
00476             s2 -= XGraph::ScrPoint(dx/2, 0, 0);
00477             painter->setColor(*lineColor(), alpha1*alpha);
00478             if(colorplot) painter->setColor(colorhigh, alpha1*alpha); 
00479             painter->setVertex(s1);
00480             painter->setColor(*lineColor(), alpha2*alpha);
00481             if(colorplot) painter->setColor(colorlow, alpha2*alpha);
00482             painter->setVertex(s2);
00483             painter->endLine();
00484         }
00485         if(*drawPoints())
00486         {
00487             float alpha = max(0.0f, min((float)(*intensity() * PLOT_POINT_INTENS), 1.0f));
00488             painter->setColor(*pointColor(), alpha );
00489             painter->beginPoint(PLOT_POINT_SIZE);
00490             if(colorplot)
00491                 painter->setColor(colorhigh);
00492             painter->setVertex(spt);
00493             if(colorplot) {
00494                 painter->setColor(colorhigh);
00495                 painter->setVertex(spt);
00496             }
00497             painter->endPoint();
00498         }
00499         return 0;
00500     }
00501     return -1;
00502 }
00503 
00504 int
00505 XPlot::drawPlot(XQGraphPainter *painter)
00506 {
00507     XScopedTryLock<XPlot> lock(*this);
00508     if(lock) {      
00509         bool colorplot = *colorPlot();
00510         bool hasweight = m_curAxisW;
00511         int cnt = snappedCount();
00512         tCanvasPoint *cpt;
00513         {
00514             XGraph::ScrPoint s1;
00515             XGraph::GPoint g1;
00516             unsigned int colorhigh = *colorPlotColorHigh();
00517             unsigned int colorlow = *colorPlotColorLow();
00518             unsigned int linecolor = *lineColor();
00519             cpt = &m_canvasPtsSnapped[0];
00520             for(int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00521             {
00522                 XGraph::ValPoint pt = snappedPoints(i);
00523                 valToGraphFast(pt, &g1);
00524                 graphToScreenFast(g1, &s1);
00525                 cpt->scr = s1;
00526                 cpt->graph = g1;
00527                 cpt->insidecube = isPtIncluded(g1);
00528                 if(colorplot) {
00529                     cpt->color = blendColor(colorlow, colorhigh, 
00530                                             hasweight ? cpt->graph.w : cpt->graph.z);
00531                 }
00532                 else {
00533                     cpt->color = linecolor;
00534                 }
00535                 cpt++;
00536             }
00537         }
00538         if(*drawBars())
00539         {
00540             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2;
00541             tCanvasPoint pt2;
00542             double g0y = m_curAxisY->valToAxis(0.0);
00543             m_curAxisY->axisToScreen(g0y, &s2);
00544             double s0y = s2.y;
00545             float alpha = max(0.0f, min((float)(*intensity() * PLOT_BAR_INTENS), 1.0f));
00546             painter->setColor(*barColor(), alpha );
00547             painter->beginLine(1.0);
00548             cpt = &m_canvasPtsSnapped[0];
00549             for(int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00550             {
00551                 pt2 = *cpt;
00552                 pt2.graph.y = g0y;
00553                 pt2.scr.y = s0y;
00554                 pt2.insidecube = isPtIncluded(pt2.graph);
00555                 if(clipLine(*cpt, pt2, &s1, &s2, false, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL))
00556                 {
00557                     if(colorplot || hasweight) painter->setColor(cpt->color, alpha * cpt->scr.w); 
00558                     painter->setVertex(s1);
00559                     painter->setVertex(s2);
00560                 }
00561                 cpt++;
00562             }
00563             painter->endLine();
00564         }
00565         if(*drawLines())
00566         {
00567             float alpha = max(0.0f, min((float)(*intensity() * PLOT_LINE_INTENS), 1.0f));
00568             painter->setColor(*lineColor(), alpha );
00569             painter->beginLine(1.0);
00570             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2;
00571             cpt = &m_canvasPtsSnapped[0];
00572             unsigned int color1, color2;
00573             float alpha1, alpha2;
00574             for(int i = 1; i < cnt; i++)
00575             {
00576                 if(clipLine(*cpt, *(cpt + 1), &s1, &s2, colorplot || hasweight, &color1, &color2, &alpha1, &alpha2)) {
00577                     if(colorplot || hasweight) painter->setColor(color1, alpha*alpha1);
00578                     painter->setVertex(s1);
00579                     if(colorplot || hasweight) painter->setColor(color2, alpha*alpha2);
00580                     painter->setVertex(s2);
00581                 }
00582                 cpt++;
00583             }
00584             painter->endLine();
00585         }
00586         if(*drawPoints())
00587         {
00588             float alpha = max(0.0f, min((float)(*intensity() * PLOT_POINT_INTENS), 1.0f));
00589             painter->setColor(*pointColor(), alpha );
00590             painter->beginPoint(PLOT_POINT_SIZE);
00591             unsigned int pointcolor = *pointColor();
00592             cpt = &m_canvasPtsSnapped[0];
00593             for(int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00594             {
00595                 if(cpt->insidecube) {
00596                     if(colorplot)
00597                         painter->setColor(cpt->color, alpha * cpt->scr.w);
00598                     else
00599                         if(hasweight)
00600                             painter->setColor(pointcolor, alpha * cpt->scr.w);
00601                     painter->setVertex(cpt->scr);
00602                 }
00603                 cpt++;
00604             }
00605             painter->endPoint();
00606         }
00607         return 0;
00608     }
00609     return -1;
00610 }
00611 
00612 unsigned int
00613 XPlot::blendColor(unsigned int c1, unsigned int c2, float t)
00614 {
00615     unsigned char c1red = qRed((QRgb)c1);
00616     unsigned char c1green = qGreen((QRgb)c1);
00617     unsigned char c1blue = qBlue((QRgb)c1);
00618     unsigned char c2red = qRed((QRgb)c2);
00619     unsigned char c2green = qGreen((QRgb)c2);
00620     unsigned char c2blue = qBlue((QRgb)c2);
00621     return (unsigned int)qRgb(
00622         lrintf(c2red * t + c1red * (1.0f - t)),
00623         lrintf(c2green * t + c1green * (1.0f - t)),
00624         lrintf(c2blue * t + c1blue * (1.0f - t)));
00625 }
00626 
00627 bool
00628 XPlot::isPtIncluded(const XGraph::GPoint &pt)
00629 {
00630     return (pt.x >= 0) && (pt.x <= 1) &&
00631         (pt.y >= 0) && (pt.y <= 1) &&
00632         (pt.z >= 0) && (pt.z <= 1);
00633 }
00634 
00635 bool
00636 XPlot::clipLine(const tCanvasPoint &c1, const tCanvasPoint &c2,
00637                 XGraph::ScrPoint *s1, XGraph::ScrPoint *s2, bool blendcolor,
00638                 unsigned int *color1, unsigned int *color2, float *alpha1, float *alpha2)
00639 {
00640     if(c1.insidecube && c2.insidecube) {
00641         *s1 = c1.scr; *s2 = c2.scr;
00642         if(blendcolor) {
00643             *color1 = c1.color;
00644             *color2 = c2.color;
00645             *alpha1 = c1.scr.w;
00646             *alpha2 = c1.scr.w;
00647         }
00648         return true;
00649     }
00650     XGraph::GPoint g1 = c1.graph;
00651     XGraph::GPoint g2 = c2.graph;
00652   
00653     XGraph::GFloat idx = 1.0 / (g1.x - g2.x);
00654     XGraph::GFloat tx0 = -g2.x * idx;
00655     XGraph::GFloat tx1 = (1.0 - g2.x) * idx;
00656     XGraph::GFloat txmin = min(tx0, tx1);
00657     XGraph::GFloat txmax = max(tx0, tx1);
00658   
00659     XGraph::GFloat idy = 1.0 / (g1.y - g2.y);
00660     XGraph::GFloat ty0 = -g2.y * idy;
00661     XGraph::GFloat ty1 = (1.0 - g2.y) * idy;
00662     XGraph::GFloat tymin = min(ty0, ty1);
00663     XGraph::GFloat tymax = max(ty0, ty1);
00664   
00665     XGraph::GFloat tmin = max(txmin, tymin);
00666     XGraph::GFloat tmax = min(txmax, tymax);
00667   
00668     if(m_curAxisZ) {
00669         if(tmin >= tmax) return false;
00670         XGraph::GFloat idz = 1.0 / (g1.z - g2.z);
00671         XGraph::GFloat tz0 = -g2.z * idz;
00672         XGraph::GFloat tz1 = (1.0 - g2.z) * idz;
00673         XGraph::GFloat tzmin = min(tz0, tz1);
00674         XGraph::GFloat tzmax = max(tz0, tz1);
00675         tmin = max(tmin, tzmin);
00676         tmax = min(tmax, tzmax);
00677     }  
00678 
00679     if(tmin >= tmax) return false;
00680     if(tmin >= 1.0) return false;
00681     if(tmax <= 0.0) return false;
00682    
00683     if(tmin > 0.0) {
00684         graphToScreenFast(XGraph::GPoint(
00685                               tmin*g1.x + (1.0 - tmin) *g2.x,
00686                               tmin*g1.y + (1.0 - tmin) *g2.y,
00687                               tmin*g1.z + (1.0 - tmin) *g2.z)
00688                           , s2);
00689         if(blendcolor) {
00690             *color2 = blendColor(c2.color, c1.color, tmin);
00691             *alpha2 = tmin * c1.scr.w + (1.0 - tmin) * c2.scr.w;
00692         }
00693     }
00694     else {
00695         *s2 = c2.scr;
00696         if(blendcolor) {
00697             *color2 = c2.color;
00698             *alpha2 = c2.scr.w;
00699         }
00700     }
00701     if(tmax < 1.0) {
00702         graphToScreenFast(XGraph::GPoint(
00703                               tmax*g1.x + (1.0 - tmax) *g2.x,
00704                               tmax*g1.y + (1.0 - tmax) *g2.y,
00705                               tmax*g1.z + (1.0 - tmax) *g2.z)
00706                           , s1);
00707         if(blendcolor) {
00708             *color2 = blendColor(c2.color, c1.color, tmax);
00709             *alpha2 = tmax * c1.scr.w + (1.0 - tmax) * c2.scr.w;
00710         }
00711     }
00712     else {
00713         *s1 = c1.scr;
00714         if(blendcolor) {
00715             *color1 = c1.color;
00716             *alpha1 = c1.scr.w;
00717         }
00718     }
00719     return true;
00720 }
00721 void
00722 XPlot::snapshot()
00723 {
00724     unsigned int cnt = std::min((unsigned int)*maxCount(), count());
00725     m_cntSnapped = cnt;
00726     m_ptsSnapped.resize(cnt);
00727     m_canvasPtsSnapped.resize(cnt);
00728     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_cntSnapped; i++) {
00729         m_ptsSnapped[i] = points(i);
00730     }
00731 }
00732 
00733 inline void
00734 XPlot::validateAutoScaleOnePoint(const XGraph::ValPoint &pt)
00735 {
00736     bool included = true;
00737     included = included && ((*m_curAxisX->autoScale()) || m_curAxisX->isIncluded(pt.x));
00738     included = included && ((*m_curAxisY->autoScale()) || m_curAxisY->isIncluded(pt.y));
00739     if(m_curAxisZ)
00740         included = included && ((*m_curAxisZ->autoScale()) || m_curAxisZ->isIncluded(pt.z));
00741     if(m_curAxisW)
00742         included = included && ((*m_curAxisW->autoScale()) || m_curAxisW->isIncluded(pt.w));
00743     else
00744         included = included && (pt.w > (XGraph::VFloat)1e-20);
00745     if(included) {
00746         m_curAxisX->tryInclude(pt.x);
00747         m_curAxisY->tryInclude(pt.y);
00748         if(m_curAxisZ)
00749             m_curAxisZ->tryInclude(pt.z);
00750         if(m_curAxisW)
00751             m_curAxisW->tryInclude(pt.w);
00752     }
00753 }
00754 
00755 int
00756 XPlot::validateAutoScale()
00757 {
00758     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < snappedCount(); i++)
00759     {
00760         XGraph::ValPoint pt = snappedPoints(i);
00761         validateAutoScaleOnePoint(pt);
00762     }
00763     return 0;
00764 }
00765 XGraph::ValPoint
00766 XXYPlot::points(unsigned int index) const
00767 {
00768     XGraph::ValPoint point;
00769 //  pts_mutex.ReadLock();
00770     point = m_points[index];
00771 //  pts_mutex.ReadUnlock();
00772     return point;
00773 }
00774 
00775 int
00776 XXYPlot::setMaxCount(unsigned int )
00777 {
00778     clearAllPoints();
00779     return 0;
00780 }
00781 
00782 int
00783 XXYPlot::clearAllPoints()
00784 {
00785     shared_ptr<XGraph> graph(m_graph);
00786     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*graph);
00787     m_points.clear();
00788     graph->requestUpdate();
00789     return 0;
00790 }
00791 
00792 int
00793 XXYPlot::addPoint(XGraph::VFloat x, XGraph::VFloat y, XGraph::VFloat z, XGraph::VFloat w)
00794 {
00795     XGraph::ValPoint npt(x, y, z, w);
00796 
00797     //! this may cause exception, in rare cases
00798     shared_ptr<XGraph> graph(m_graph);
00799     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*graph);
00800   
00801     if((count() >= *maxCount()) && count()) {
00802         m_points.pop_front();
00803     }
00804     m_points.push_back(npt);
00805     
00806     graph->requestUpdate();
00807     return 0;
00808 }
00809 
00810 XAxis::XAxis(const char *name, bool runtime,
00811              AxisDirection dir, bool rightOrTop, const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph) : 
00812     XNode(name, runtime),
00813     m_direction(dir),
00814     m_dirVector( (dir == DirAxisX) ? 1.0 : 0.0, 
00815                  (dir == DirAxisY) ? 1.0 : 0.0, (dir == DirAxisZ) ? 1.0 : 0.0),
00816     m_graph(graph),
00817     m_label(create<XStringNode>("Label", true)),
00818     m_x(create<XDoubleNode>("X", true)),
00819     m_y(create<XDoubleNode>("Y", true)),
00820     m_z(create<XDoubleNode>("Z", true)),
00821     m_length(create<XDoubleNode>("Length", true)), // in screen coordinate
00822     m_majorTicScale(create<XDoubleNode>("MajorTicScale", true)),
00823     m_minorTicScale(create<XDoubleNode>("MinorTicScale", true)),
00824     m_displayMajorTics(create<XBoolNode>("DisplayMajorTics", true)),
00825     m_displayMinorTics(create<XBoolNode>("DisplayMinorTics", true)),
00826     m_max(create<XDoubleNode>("Max", true)),
00827     m_min(create<XDoubleNode>("Min", true)),
00828     m_rightOrTopSided(create<XBoolNode>("RightOrTopSided", true)), //sit on right, top
00829     m_ticLabelFormat(create<XStringNode>("TicLabelFormat", true)),
00830     m_displayLabel(create<XBoolNode>("DisplayLabel", true)),
00831     m_displayTicLabels(create<XBoolNode>("DisplayTicLabels", true)),
00832     m_ticColor(create<XHexNode>("TicColor", true)),
00833     m_labelColor(create<XHexNode>("LabelColor", true)),
00834     m_ticLabelColor(create<XHexNode>("TicLabelColor", true)),
00835     m_autoFreq(create<XBoolNode>("AutoFreq", true)),
00836     m_autoScale(create<XBoolNode>("AutoScale", true)),
00837     m_logScale(create<XBoolNode>("LogScale", true))
00838 {
00839     m_ticLabelFormat->setValidator(&formatDoubleValidator);
00840   
00841     x()->value(0.15);
00842     y()->value(0.15);
00843     z()->value(0.15);
00844     length()->value(0.7);
00845     maxValue()->value(0);
00846     minValue()->value(0);
00847     ticLabelFormat()->value("");
00848     logScale()->value(false);
00849     displayLabel()->value(true);
00850     displayTicLabels()->value(true);
00851     displayMajorTics()->value(true);
00852     displayMinorTics()->value(true);
00853     autoFreq()->value(true);
00854     autoScale()->value(true);
00855     rightOrTopSided()->value(rightOrTop);
00856     majorTicScale()->value(10);
00857     minorTicScale()->value(1);
00858     labelColor()->value(clBlack);
00859     ticColor()->value(clBlack);
00860     ticLabelColor()->value(clBlack);
00861 
00862     if(rightOrTop) {
00863         if(dir == DirAxisY) x()->value(1.0- *x());
00864         if(dir == DirAxisX) y()->value(1.0- *y());
00865     }
00866     _startAutoscale(true);
00867 
00868     maxValue()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00869     minValue()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00870     label()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00871     logScale()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00872     autoScale()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00873     x()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00874     y()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00875     z()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00876     length()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00877     ticLabelFormat()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00878     displayLabel()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00879     displayTicLabels()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00880     displayMajorTics()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00881     displayMinorTics()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00882     autoFreq()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00883     rightOrTopSided()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00884     majorTicScale()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00885     minorTicScale()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00886     labelColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00887     ticColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00888     ticLabelColor()->onValueChanged().connect(graph->lsnPropertyChanged());
00889 }
00890 
00891 
00892 void
00893 XAxis::_startAutoscale(bool clearscale)
00894 {
00895     m_bLogscaleFixed = *logScale();
00896     m_bAutoscaleFixed = *autoScale();
00897     if(clearscale) {
00898         m_minFixed = XGraph::VFLOAT_MAX;
00899         m_maxFixed = m_bLogscaleFixed ? 0 : - XGraph::VFLOAT_MAX;
00900     }
00901     else {
00902         m_minFixed = m_bLogscaleFixed ? max((XGraph::VFloat)*minValue(), (XGraph::VFloat)0.0) : 
00903             (XGraph::VFloat)*minValue();
00904         m_maxFixed = *maxValue();
00905     }
00906     m_invMaxMinusMinFixed = -1; //undef
00907     m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed = -1; //undef
00908 }
00909 void
00910 XAxis::startAutoscale(float, bool clearscale)
00911 {
00912     _startAutoscale(clearscale);
00913 }
00914 void
00915 XAxis::fixScale(float resolution, bool suppressupdate)
00916 {
00917     if(suppressupdate) {
00918         m_graph.lock()->lsnPropertyChanged()->mask();
00919     }
00920     if(m_minFixed == m_maxFixed) {
00921         XGraph::VFloat x = m_minFixed;
00922         m_maxFixed = x ? std::max(x * 1.01, x * 0.99) : 0.01;
00923         m_minFixed = x ? std::min(x * 1.01, x * 0.99) : -0.01;
00924     }
00925     XGraph::VFloat min_tmp = m_bLogscaleFixed ? 
00926         max((XGraph::VFloat)*minValue(), (XGraph::VFloat)0.0) : (XGraph::VFloat)*minValue();
00927     if(m_minFixed != min_tmp) {
00928         minValue()->setFormat(ticLabelFormat()->to_str().c_str());
00929         minValue()->value(m_minFixed);
00930     }
00931     if(m_maxFixed != *maxValue()) {
00932         maxValue()->setFormat(ticLabelFormat()->to_str().c_str());
00933         maxValue()->value(m_maxFixed);
00934     }
00935     if(suppressupdate) {
00936         m_graph.lock()->lsnPropertyChanged()->unmask();
00937     }
00938     performAutoFreq(resolution);
00939 }
00940 void
00941 XAxis::performAutoFreq(float resolution)
00942 {
00943     if(*autoFreq() &&
00944        (!m_bLogscaleFixed || (m_minFixed >= 0)) &&
00945        (m_minFixed < m_maxFixed))
00946     {
00947         float fac = max(0.7f, log10f(2e-3 / resolution) );
00948         m_majorFixed = (VFLOAT_POW((XGraph::VFloat)10.0,
00949                                    VFLOAT_RINT(VFLOAT_LOG10(m_maxFixed - m_minFixed) - fac)));
00950         m_minorFixed = m_majorFixed / (XGraph::VFloat)2.0;
00951     }
00952     else {
00953         m_majorFixed = *majorTicScale();
00954         m_minorFixed = *minorTicScale();
00955     }
00956 }
00957 
00958 inline bool
00959 XAxis::isIncluded(XGraph::VFloat x)
00960 {
00961     return (x >= m_minFixed)
00962         && ((m_direction == AxisWeight) || (x <= m_maxFixed));
00963 }
00964 inline void
00965 XAxis::tryInclude(XGraph::VFloat x)
00966 {
00967     //omits negative values in log scaling
00968     if(!(m_bLogscaleFixed && (x <= 0))) {
00969         if(m_bAutoscaleFixed) {
00970             if(x > m_maxFixed) {
00971                 m_maxFixed = x;
00972                 m_invMaxMinusMinFixed = -1; //undef
00973                 m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed = -1; //undef
00974             }         
00975             if(x < m_minFixed) {
00976                 m_minFixed = x;
00977                 m_invMaxMinusMinFixed = -1; //undef
00978                 m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed = -1; //undef
00979             }
00980         }
00981     }
00982 }
00983 
00984 void
00985 XAxis::zoom(bool minchange, bool maxchange, XGraph::GFloat prop, XGraph::GFloat center)
00986 {
00987     if(direction() == AxisWeight) return;
00988     
00989     if(maxchange) {
00990         m_maxFixed = axisToVal(center + (XGraph::GFloat)0.5 / prop);
00991     }
00992     if(minchange) {
00993         m_minFixed = axisToVal(center - (XGraph::GFloat)0.5 / prop);
00994     }
00995     m_invMaxMinusMinFixed = -1; //undef
00996     m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed = -1; //undef
00997 }
00998 
00999 XGraph::GFloat
01000 XAxis::valToAxis(XGraph::VFloat x)
01001 {
01002     XGraph::GFloat pos;
01003     if(m_bLogscaleFixed)
01004     {
01005         if ((x <= 0) || (m_minFixed <= 0) || (m_maxFixed <= m_minFixed))
01006             return - XGraph::GFLOAT_MAX;
01007         if(m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed < 0)
01008             m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed = 1 / VFLOAT_LOG(m_maxFixed / m_minFixed);  
01009         pos = VFLOAT_LOG(x / m_minFixed) * m_invLogMaxOverMinFixed;
01010     }
01011     else
01012     {
01013         if(m_maxFixed <= m_minFixed) return -1;
01014         if(m_invMaxMinusMinFixed < 0)
01015             m_invMaxMinusMinFixed = 1 / (m_maxFixed - m_minFixed);
01016         pos = (x - m_minFixed) * m_invMaxMinusMinFixed;
01017     }
01018     return pos;
01019 }
01020 
01021 XGraph::VFloat
01022 XAxis::axisToVal(XGraph::GFloat pos, XGraph::GFloat axis_prec)
01023 {
01024     XGraph::VFloat x = 0;
01025     if(axis_prec <= 0) {
01026         if(m_bLogscaleFixed) {
01027             if((m_minFixed <= 0) || (m_maxFixed < m_minFixed)) return 0;
01028             x = m_minFixed * VFLOAT_EXP(VFLOAT_LOG(m_maxFixed / m_minFixed) * pos);
01029         }
01030         else {
01031             if(m_maxFixed < m_minFixed) return 0;
01032             x = m_minFixed + pos *(m_maxFixed - m_minFixed);
01033         }
01034         return x;
01035     }
01036     else {
01037         x = axisToVal(pos);
01038         XGraph::VFloat dx = axisToVal(pos + axis_prec) - x;
01039         return setprec(x, dx);
01040     }
01041 }
01042 
01043 void
01044 XAxis::axisToScreen(XGraph::GFloat pos, XGraph::ScrPoint *scr)
01045 {
01046     XGraph::SFloat len = *length();
01047     pos *= len;
01048     scr->x = *x() + ((m_direction == DirAxisX) ? pos: (XGraph::SFloat) 0.0);
01049     scr->y = *y() + ((m_direction == DirAxisY) ? pos: (XGraph::SFloat) 0.0);
01050     scr->z = *z() + ((m_direction == DirAxisZ) ? pos: (XGraph::SFloat) 0.0);
01051 }
01052 XGraph::GFloat
01053 XAxis::screenToAxis(const XGraph::ScrPoint &scr)
01054 {
01055     XGraph::SFloat _x = scr.x - *x();
01056     XGraph::SFloat _y = scr.y - *y();
01057     XGraph::SFloat _z = scr.z - *z();
01058     XGraph::GFloat pos = ((m_direction == DirAxisX) ? _x : 
01059                           ((m_direction == DirAxisY) ? _y : _z)) / (XGraph::SFloat)*length();
01060     return pos;
01061 }
01062 XGraph::VFloat
01063 XAxis::screenToVal(const XGraph::ScrPoint &scr)
01064 {
01065     return axisToVal(screenToAxis(scr));
01066 }
01067 void
01068 XAxis::valToScreen(XGraph::VFloat val, XGraph::ScrPoint *scr)
01069 {
01070     axisToScreen(valToAxis(val), scr);
01071 }
01072 XString
01073 XAxis::valToString(XGraph::VFloat val)
01074 {
01075     return formatDouble(ticLabelFormat()->to_str().c_str(), val);
01076 }
01077 
01078 XAxis::Tic
01079 XAxis::queryTic(int len, int pos, XGraph::VFloat *ticnum)
01080 {
01081     XGraph::VFloat x, t;
01082     if(m_bLogscaleFixed)
01083     {
01084         x = axisToVal((XGraph::GFloat)pos / len);
01085         if(x <= 0) return NoTics;
01086         t = VFLOAT_POW((XGraph::VFloat)10.0, VFLOAT_RINT(VFLOAT_LOG10(x)));
01087         if(GFLOAT_LRINT(valToAxis(t) * len) == pos)
01088         {
01089             *ticnum = t;
01090             return MajorTic;
01091         }
01092         x = x / t;
01093         if(x < 1)
01094             t = VFLOAT_RINT(x / (XGraph::VFloat)0.1) * (XGraph::VFloat)0.1 * t;
01095         else
01096             t = VFLOAT_RINT(x) * t;
01097         if(GFLOAT_LRINT(valToAxis(t) * len) == pos)
01098         {
01099             *ticnum = t;
01100             return MinorTic;
01101         }
01102         return NoTics;
01103     }
01104     else
01105     {
01106         x = axisToVal((XGraph::GFloat)pos / len);
01107         t = VFLOAT_RINT(x / m_majorFixed) * m_majorFixed;
01108         if(GFLOAT_LRINT(valToAxis(t) * len) == pos)
01109         {
01110             *ticnum = t;
01111             return MajorTic;
01112         }
01113         t = VFLOAT_RINT(x / m_minorFixed) * m_minorFixed;
01114         if(GFLOAT_LRINT(valToAxis(t) * len) == pos)
01115         {
01116             *ticnum = t;
01117             return MinorTic;
01118         }
01119         return NoTics;
01120     }
01121 }
01122 
01123 
01124 void
01125 XAxis::drawLabel(XQGraphPainter *painter)
01126 {
01127     if(m_direction == AxisWeight) return;
01128   
01129     const int sizehint = 2;
01130     painter->setColor(*labelColor());
01131     XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2, s3;
01132     axisToScreen(0.5, &s1);
01133     s2 = s1;
01134     axisToScreen(1.5, &s3);
01135     s3 -= s2;
01136     painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s1, AxisToLabel);
01137     s2 -= s1;
01138     s2 *= -1;
01139     if(!painter->selectFont(*label(), s1, s2, s3, sizehint)) {
01140         painter->drawText(s1, *label());
01141         return;
01142     }
01143     
01144     axisToScreen(1.02, &s1);
01145     axisToScreen(1.05, &s2);
01146     s2 -= s1;
01147     s3 = s1;
01148     painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s3, 0.7);
01149     s3 -= s1;
01150     if(!painter->selectFont(*label(), s1, s2, s3, sizehint)) {
01151         painter->drawText(s1, *label());
01152         return;
01153     }
01154     
01155     axisToScreen(0.5, &s1);
01156     s2 = s1;
01157     axisToScreen(1.5, &s3);
01158     s3 -= s2;
01159     painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s1, -AxisToLabel);
01160     s2 -= s1;
01161     s2 *= -1;
01162     if(!painter->selectFont(*label(), s1, s2, s3, sizehint)) {
01163         painter->drawText(s1, *label());
01164         return;
01165     }
01166 }
01167 
01168 
01169 int
01170 XAxis::drawAxis(XQGraphPainter *painter)
01171 {
01172     if(m_direction == AxisWeight) return -1;
01173   
01174     XGraph::SFloat LenMajorTicL = 0.01;
01175     XGraph::SFloat LenMinorTicL = 0.005;
01176 
01177     painter->setColor(*ticColor());
01178 
01179     XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2;
01180     axisToScreen(0.0, &s1);
01181     axisToScreen(1.0, &s2);
01182 
01183     painter->beginLine();
01184     painter->setVertex(s1);
01185     painter->setVertex(s2);
01186     painter->endLine();
01187   
01188     if(*displayLabel())
01189     {
01190         drawLabel(painter);
01191         
01192     }
01193     if(m_bLogscaleFixed && (m_minFixed < 0)) return -1;
01194     if(m_maxFixed <= m_minFixed) return -1;
01195   
01196     int len = SFLOAT_LRINT(*length() / painter->resScreen());
01197     painter->defaultFont();
01198     XGraph::GFloat mindx = 2, lastg = -1;
01199     //!dry-run to determine font
01200     for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01201         XGraph::VFloat z;
01202         XGraph::GFloat x = (XGraph::GFloat)i / len;
01203         if(queryTic(len, i, &z) == MajorTic)
01204         {
01205             if(mindx > x - lastg) {
01206                 axisToScreen(x, &s1);
01207                 s2 = s1;
01208                 XGraph::ScrPoint s3;
01209                 axisToScreen(lastg, &s3);
01210                 s3 -= s2;
01211                 s3 *= 0.7;
01212                 painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s1, AxisToTicLabel);
01213                 s2 -= s1;
01214                 s2 *= -1;
01215             
01216                 double var = setprec(z, m_bLogscaleFixed ? (XGraph::VFloat)z :  m_minorFixed);
01217                 painter->selectFont(valToString(var), s1, s2, s3, 0);
01218             
01219                 mindx = x - lastg;
01220             }
01221             lastg = x;
01222         }
01223     }
01224   
01225     for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01226         XGraph::VFloat z;
01227         XGraph::GFloat x = (XGraph::GFloat)i / len;
01228         switch(queryTic(len, i, &z))
01229         {
01230         case MajorTic:
01231             if(*displayMajorTics())
01232             {
01233                 axisToScreen(x, &s1);
01234                 painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s1, LenMajorTicL);
01235                 axisToScreen(x, &s2);
01236                 painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s2, -LenMajorTicL);
01237                 painter->setColor(*ticColor());
01238                 painter->beginLine(1.0);
01239                 painter->setVertex(s1);
01240                 painter->setVertex(s2);
01241                 painter->endLine();
01242             }
01243             if(*displayTicLabels())
01244             {
01245                 axisToScreen(x, &s1);
01246                 painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s1, AxisToTicLabel);
01247                 double var = setprec(z, m_bLogscaleFixed ? (XGraph::VFloat)z : m_minorFixed);
01248                 painter->drawText(s1, valToString(var));
01249             }
01250             break;
01251         case MinorTic:
01252             if(*displayMinorTics())
01253             {
01254                 axisToScreen(x, &s1);
01255                 painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s1, LenMinorTicL);
01256                 axisToScreen(x, &s2);
01257                 painter->posOffAxis(m_dirVector, &s2, -LenMinorTicL);
01258                 painter->setColor(*ticColor());
01259                 painter->beginLine(1.0);
01260                 painter->setVertex(s1);
01261                 painter->setVertex(s2);
01262                 painter->endLine();
01263             }
01264             break;
01265         case NoTics:
01266             break;
01267         }
01268     }
01269     return 0;
01270 }
01271 
01272 XFuncPlot::XFuncPlot(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph)
01273     : XPlot(name, runtime, graph)
01274 {
01275     maxCount()->value(300);
01276 }
01277 
01278 int
01279 XFuncPlot::setMaxCount(unsigned int cnt)
01280 {
01281     m_count = cnt;
01282     return 0;
01283 }
01284 XGraph::ValPoint
01285 XFuncPlot::snappedPoints(unsigned int index) const
01286 {
01287     XGraph::ValPoint pt;
01288     pt.x = m_curAxisX->axisToVal((XGraph::GFloat)index / count());
01289     pt.y = func(pt.x);
01290     pt.z = 0.0;
01291     return pt;
01292 }
01293 unsigned int
01294 XFuncPlot::snappedCount() const
01295 {
01296     return m_count;
01297 }
01298 XGraph::ValPoint
01299 XFuncPlot::points(unsigned int index) const
01300 {
01301     return snappedPoints(index);
01302 }
01303 unsigned int
01304 XFuncPlot::count() const
01305 {
01306     return snappedCount();
01307 }
